# dataSource

**Instance Property**

The object that provides the data for the scrubber.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var dataSource: (any NSScrubberDataSource)? { get set }
```

## Configuring the scrubber

- **delegate**: The object that acts as the delegate of the scrubber.
